# File lib/device_atlas.rb, line 234
  def _valueAsTypedFromId(tree, id, propertyId)
    obj = tree['v'][id]
    case tree['p'][propertyId.to_i][0..0]
      when 's'
        return obj.to_s
      when 'b'
        return (obj.to_i == 1)
      when 'i'
        return obj.to_i
      when 'd'
        return Date.parse(obj)
    end
  end
